mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book(ISBN, name, author, press, type, pricing, number, remaining, borrow, date, introduction) VALUES (#{ISBN}, #{name}, #{author}, #{press}, #{type}, #{pricing}, #{number}, #{remaining}, #{borrow}, #{date}, #{introduction})
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET name=#{name}, author=#{author}, press=#{press}, type=#{type}, pricing=#{pricing}, number=#{number}, remaining=#{remaining}, borrow=#{borrow}, date= #{date}, introduction=#{introduction} where ISBN = #{ISBN}

UPDATE book SET
remaining=remaining-1
remaining=remaining+1
WHERE ISBN=#{ISBN}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM book order by date desc limit 5;
